Policy.intro: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, store and share your personal data when you use our website, services or interact with us.
Policy.title: Privacy Policy & Consent

section1.title: 1. When we collect personal data
section1.description: We only collect personal data when you actively choose to share it with us, typically when you:

list.contact: Send us a message through our contact form (questions, collaboration, or a request for an offer).
list.calculator: Use our pricing calculator and request a non-binding estimate.
list.job: Apply for a job or internship at Arzonic ApS via a form or email.

section1.note: We do not intentionally collect sensitive personal data through our website.

section2.title: 2. What data we collect
section2.description: Depending on how you contact us, we may collect:

list.common: Contact details: name, email, phone number, and the information you provide in the message field.
list.calculator: Company and project details to prepare a realistic estimate (e.g., scope, preferences, timeline).
list.job: Job application materials: CV, cover letter, portfolio, links (e.g., GitHub, LinkedIn, website) and any attachments you provide. These are handled confidentially and only by relevant persons.

section2.note: We only request the information necessary to respond, provide an estimate/offer, or evaluate your application.

section3.title: 3. How we use your data
section3.description: We use your data for a limited set of purposes:

list.inquiry: To respond to your inquiry and provide the information or support you requested.
list.offer: To prepare and send estimates, offers, and follow-ups related to the pricing calculator or direct dialogue.
list.job: To evaluate job/internship applications, invite candidates to interviews, and communicate about the process.
list.improvement: To improve our service and communication (e.g., understanding what types of requests we receive).

section3.note: We do not use your data for unsolicited marketing, and we do not share it without a clear purpose and lawful basis.

section4.title: 4. Job & internship applications
section4.description: We treat applications confidentially and handle them internally:

list.access: Only relevant people at Arzonic ApS (e.g., owner or directly involved team members/partners) may access your application.
list.noAutomated: We do not use automated decision-making to filter applicants; applications are reviewed by a person.
list.references: We only contact references if you have given consent.
list.unsolicited: Unsolicited applications are used only to assess fit for current or future opportunities.

section4.retention: If you are not hired, we generally retain your application and attachments for up to 6 months, or until it is no longer relevant. In some cases we may delete earlier (e.g., within 30 days after the process ends), unless we have agreed in writing to keep it longer.

section5.title: 5. Facebook & Instagram access (Meta System User)
section5.description1: For some customers, we offer functionality that enables publishing content to a Facebook Page or Instagram Business account via our platform. This is handled through a Meta System User.

list.pages: Access is limited to the pages/accounts you explicitly approve in Meta Business.
list.publish: We only publish content that you have approved for your selected pages/accounts.

section5.description2: This integration does not retrieve personal data from your private Meta profile (e.g., personal email, friends list). It is a technical connection used solely to publish content on your behalf. You can revoke access at any time in your Meta Business settings.

section6.title: 6. Storage & deletion
section6.description: We store data securely and only for as long as necessary:

list.noCustomer: If you contact us but do not become a customer, we typically delete your information within 30 days after our last dialogue.
list.customer: If you become a customer, we retain relevant information as needed to deliver services and comply with legal obligations (e.g., bookkeeping).
list.job: Job/internship applications (including CV and attachments) are normally stored for up to 6 months after the recruitment process ends, or until no longer relevant, and then deleted.

section6.note: You may request deletion earlier, unless we are required to keep certain data by law.

section7.title: 7. Sharing with third parties
section7.description: We do not sell your data. We only share data when necessary and appropriate:

list.providers: Service providers and partners who support operations (e.g., hosting, email, project tools) under data processing agreements.
list.legal: Authorities when we are legally required to do so (e.g., audit or legal compliance).

section7.note: Third parties are not permitted to use your data for their own purposes.

section8.title: 8. Your rights
section8.description: You have rights regarding your personal data, including:

list.access: Right of access – to know what data we hold about you.
list.correct: Right to rectification – to correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
list.delete: Right to erasure – to have data deleted when legally possible.
list.limit: Right to restriction – in some cases, to limit how we process your data.
list.object: Right to object – in certain cases, to object to processing.
list.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent – if processing is based on consent.

section8.note: To exercise your rights, contact us at mail@arzonic.com. We will respond as soon as possible.

section9.title: 9. Consent
section9.description1: When you submit a form on our website (contact, pricing calculator, or job application), you consent to our processing of your data for the purpose of that form.
section9.description2: You can withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us. We will stop processing and delete your data unless we are legally required to retain it (e.g., bookkeeping requirements).

section10.title: 10. Data security
section10.description: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. Only people with a legitimate need may access your data.

section11.title: 11. Updates to this policy
section11.description: We may update this policy if our services change or if required by law. The latest version will always be available on our website.

section12.title: 12. Contact details
section12.description: If you have questions about our processing of personal data—or want to exercise your rights—you can contact:

TermsModal.title: Terms of Service
TermsModal.effectiveNote: These terms apply to all agreements entered into after this date.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.description: These terms apply to all digital services, software and products delivered by Arzonic ApS ('Arzonic', 'we', 'us'). By using our website, platform, or services, you agree to these Terms of Service.

section2.title: 2. Scope of Services
section2.description: We provide web development, UI/UX, digital consultancy, integrations, hosting, design, and other digital services. Specific features, deadlines and deliverables are defined in proposals, contracts or documented communication.

section3.title: 3. Payment and Invoicing
section3.description: Unless otherwise stated, payment is due within 8 days of invoice. Some projects require upfront deposit. Late or missing payments may result in interest, fees, or suspension of services. Work delivered up to termination or suspension will be invoiced.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property and Source Code
section4.description: Unless otherwise agreed in writing, Arzonic retains ownership of source code, backend logic, design frameworks and internal development tools. The customer receives a non-exclusive license to use the delivered solution. Full IP or source code transfer must be agreed in writing and may include additional fees.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services and Limitations
section5.description: Our solutions may rely on external services such as hosting providers, APIs, analytics tools, fonts, meta integrations or social media platforms. Arzonic is not liable for downtime, data loss, rate limits, policy changes or limitations caused by third parties. We are not liable for indirect loss, business interruption or consequential damages.

section6.title: 6. Client Responsibilities and Cooperation
section6.description: The client must provide required materials, information, approvals and feedback in a timely manner. Delays in communication or missing content may postpone delivery and increase costs. Once a design, feature or deliverable is approved, modifications or new requirements are treated as change requests and may be billed separately.

section7.title: 7. Hosting, Support and Service Level
section7.description: If Arzonic provides hosting, maintenance or technical support, we will use commercially reasonable efforts to maintain availability. Scheduled updates may be performed. We do not guarantee uptime, data retention or access if the customer violates terms or fails to pay. Termination of support requires 30 days' written notice unless otherwise agreed.

section8.title: 8. Liability and Legal Limitations
section8.description: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Arzonic is not liable for indirect losses, lost revenue, marketing performance, operational impact or client execution. Any liability is limited to the total amount paid for the specific project or service.

section9.title: 9. Termination
section9.description: Contracts may be terminated with 30 days’ written notice unless stated otherwise. Arzonic may terminate immediately in case of breach, illegal activities, abuse of services or unpaid invoices. Work performed prior to termination will be invoiced.

section10.title: 10. Portfolio and Case Usage
section10.description: Arzonic may display the client’s logo, project name, publicly available visuals and results in our portfolio, presentations and marketing. If the client does not wish this, they may opt out in writing. Arzonic may still use anonymized examples or design structures that do not identify the client.

section11.title: 11. AI-Generated Content
section11.description: AI-generated text, design, media or code may contain elements for which Arzonic does not hold full copyright. Such material is provided 'as-is'. The client is responsible for legal usage, publication, and compliance. Arzonic is not liable for trademark violations, copyright disputes or restrictions from platforms or third parties. If the client requires fully original, non-AI content, this must be requested in writing and may incur additional fees.

section12.title: 12. Data Processing and GDPR
section12.description: Arzonic processes personal data according to applicable GDPR law. Arzonic acts as a data processor for technical hosting and platform services. The customer remains data controller for business data, users and marketing. The customer is responsible for lawful data collection. Arzonic may use third-party providers in EU/EEA or approved countries. See our Privacy Policy for full details.

CallToAction.collaborationMessage: At Arzonic, we work with ambitious companies across Europe to strengthen their digital presence

web-applications.hero: Web applications that support your business — built for performance and scalability.
web-applications.body:
We develop modern web applications and systems — from dashboards and internal tools to business-critical platforms.
Our focus is on performance, security, and scalable architecture, ensuring the solution grows with your business.
process: Needs analysis and business flow mapping
web-applications.cta: Have a web application in mind?

design-ux.hero: User experiences that create clarity, flow, and trust.
design-ux.body:
Great design and UX are essential for successful digital products.
We create user-centered interfaces with intuitive flows, clear structure, and a professional visual expression — always with the end user in focus.
design-ux.cta: Want to improve your user experience?

3d-visualization.hero: Interactive 3D that creates engagement and sets your solution apart.
3d-visualization.body:
3D visualization helps make complex products and ideas easier to understand.
We integrate interactive 3D directly into your digital solution — ideal for products, presentations, and engaging user experiences.

systems-integrations.hero: Reliable backend systems that connect your digital solution.
systems-integrations.body:
We design and integrate scalable backend systems — including databases, APIs, authentication, and third-party services.
Everything is built to support efficient business workflows and ensure stable, secure operations.
systems-integrations.processTitle: Our approach to systems and integrations

webapp.title: Web Applications
webapp.description: We build modern web applications – from dashboards to business-critical solutions, designed for performance and scalability.

designUx.title: Design & UX
designUx.description: User-centered design and UX that create clear flows, high usability, and a professional visual expression.

visualization.title: 3D Visualization
visualization.description: Interactive 3D integrated directly into your digital solution – ideal for products, presentations, and engaging experiences.

systemsIntegrations.title: Systems & Integrations
systemsIntegrations.description: We design and integrate scalable backend systems with databases, APIs, authentication, and third-party services.

q1.title: How long does it take?
q1.answer: It depends on the complexity of the project. A simple landing page can typically be ready in 1–2 weeks, while a custom web application or a 3D-enhanced solution may take 4–8 weeks or more. We always provide a realistic timeline at project start.

q2.title: Is maintenance included?
q2.answer: All our solutions include a service agreement covering hosting, support, maintenance, and operations. You can choose between a one-time payment or a monthly installment plan – and we’ll take care of the rest.

q3.title: Can I edit content myself?
q3.answer: Yes! All our solutions include a user-friendly CMS or dashboard that lets you easily edit text, images, and content yourself. Prefer something simpler? We can also build static solutions with zero maintenance needs.

q4.title: What if I need new features later?
q4.answer: We build with scalability in mind. It's easy to add features or expand the solution later, and we're happy to help – whether it's bookings, integrations, e-commerce or something else.

aboutPage.metaDescription: Arzonic is a modern software agency specializing in scalable web applications, immersive 3D experiences, and clean digital design.
aboutPage.textOne: Arzonic is a creative software agency driven by passion, curiosity, and a shared love for digital craftsmanship. Our team brings together experienced specialists and newly graduated talents, working across web applications, UI/UX, 3D visualization, and animation – all with a focus on building polished and value-driven digital solutions.
aboutPage.textTwo: We’re a young startup with big ambitions and an uncompromising approach to quality. Our mindset is fresh and solution-oriented. We come from diverse backgrounds, but we’re united by a desire to create work that works – and resonates. Every project is approached with care and intention, transforming ideas into functional, visually strong solutions with clear user experiences and measurable business impact. Nothing we do is templated – we build with purpose, from the ground up.
